title: Scarlett and the Kiss Thief
description: I’ve never been kissed.I know…it’s a huge problem.It all started because I fell in love with my best friend, Axel Stevens. I decided to save my first kiss for him. But…he didn’t fall in love with me back.For the first time in years, he’s finally single though. And I have the perfect plan.I reinvented myself over the summer. I’ve ditched the glasses, upgraded my wardrobe, and I’ve finally mastered the perfect strut in heels.I’m going to walk into Empire High on my first day of senior year and win him over once and for all.My plan is flawless. You have my word – I’ll be wearing his varsity jacket by the end of the day.Fingers crossed I can seal it all with my first kiss.
author: Ivy Smoak
